meanings.definition: In a frenzied or crazed manner
meanings.sent1: She ran berserkly around the playground, laughing loudly.
meanings.sent2: The dog barked berserkly at the mailman every morning.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel berserkly gathered nuts for the winter, looking quite frantic.
meanings.sent4: The storm raged berserkly, tossing debris in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The toddler painted berserkly, splattering colors everywhere.

meanings.definition: In an uncontrollably violent or aggressive manner
meanings.sent1: The villain fought berserkly against the hero, swinging wildly.
meanings.sent2: The waves crashed berserkly against the rocky shore during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The toddler berserkly threw toys around the room, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: The wind howled berserkly through the trees, bending them to its will.
meanings.sent5: The car sped berserkly down the road, narrowly avoiding collisions.
